name: Scream of the Viking 3
description: Scream of the Viking 3 - this is the third part of the hardcore platformer about Vikings. In the third part you as well as in the previous need to pass the levels, playing for a Viking.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8 Processor: 1.2 Ghz+ Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 500MB DirectX: Version 7.0 Storage: 120 MB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard\Mouse
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 1GB DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 400 MB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard\Mouse
